description: This file defines a React component `NoteCard` that displays individual note information including title, updated date, content, and action buttons for viewing, editing, and deleting notes. It also exports an `EmptyState` component indicating no notes are available.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: React functional component for displaying a note card with actions.

methods.name: EmptyState
methods.description: React functional component displaying a message when no notes exist.
